body.p: To open the directories you want to compare, select a folder from each Browse for local directory button. The Compare Directories tool keeps track of the folders you are currently working with and those that you opened in this window. You can see and select them from the two drop-down lists.
If you want to compare the content of two archives, you can select the archives from the Browse for archive file button.
body.note: By default, the supported archives are not treated as directories and the comparison is not performed on the files inside them. To make treat supported archives as directories, go to the Diff preferences page and enable the Look in archives option.
